function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Trusting online information sources can give birth to unfounded worries about personal health, specifically during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Information overload increases covid-19 related cyberchondria.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived severity of the covid-19 pandemic is a significant predictor for self-isolation intention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased spread of unverified covid-19 information due to online information trust","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Information overload leading to sharing of unverified covid-19 information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on unverified online information for covid-19 updates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cognitive overload leading to decreased social trust and careless decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in human trust in journalistic content","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in sharing of unverified covid-19 information due to online information trust","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived threat leading to non-adoption of protective health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cognitive overload from excessive information on social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited processing capability leading to difficulty in acquiring health knowledge","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of unverified information through social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Escalation of social media consumption during lockdowns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporation of health risk and technological factors in misinformation sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation drivers within the covid-19 context","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical thinking and verification of online information leading to sharing of misinformation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to accurately determine the reliability of news sources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear and anxiety altering decision-making processes during a pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation on social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bot armies to manipulate platform algorithms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Confirmation bias and echo-chambers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cyberchondria related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cognitive load and sharing unverified covid-19 information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation about covid-19 being spread through social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cyberchondria resulting from social media use during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear-driven information-seeking and perception alteration on social media during pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spreading of misinformation through social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation fueling health anxiety and impairing health-related decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address new behaviors and values in recovery packages","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to shape future outcomes through present actions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to turn global health crisis into a sustainable opportunity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising diversity and inequality within and between countries may lead to different levels of focus on sustainable change, creating a potential divide in disease mitigation efforts.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of fossil fuel-dominated economies to adapt to a sustainable path may lead to instability and conflict, impacting disease management and control efforts.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographical diversities and political responses within countries may impact the adoption of sustainable energy transitions, potentially influencing disease prevention efforts.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of a rebound to pre-pandemic ways leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of long-term behavioral and structural change related to fossil fuel demand and air quality.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of political response to warnings of human disaster and resilience in public health and welfare.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linking covid-19 deaths with air pollution","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising air pollution as lockdown eases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in political focus from short-term gains to long-term resilience measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on cars for transportation due to reduced demand for public transport, leading to higher levels of air pollution and increased risk of accidents.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards working from home and changes in travel patterns leading to long-term reduction in demand for public transport.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Connection between human activity, biodiversity loss, environmental degradation, and health highlighted by the pandemic, leading to increased awareness and urgency for environmental action.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in social practices including in mobility and work practices may lead to persistent shifts in transportation behaviors.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced high carbon travel has contributed to covid-19 related emissions reductions, but the persistence of reduced travel demand is uncertain.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debates in the public sphere about the ’new normal’ and post-covid-19 world may impact attitudes towards green stimulus and sustainable policies.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global response to covid-19 causing strain on resources and infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changing social and political practices affecting sustainable transitions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
